messageText: Just got the call from the principalâ€¦ I got the job!
oh my god that's amazing!!!! i'm so happy for you!! how's hubby taking the news?
He's really happy for me too. We're going out to celebrate tonight!
hey so how's the first week of teaching going? you settling in okay?
It's going well, thanks. The kids are lovely and I've met a really nice colleague, Mr. Anderson. He's been very helpful and has given me some great advice.
aw that's so cool! sounds like you're off to a great start! we should grab coffee soon and catch up!
Hey Angie, I need to talk to you about something that's been freaking me out.
whats going on? u sound serious
I think someone's been following me. I've seen this black car behind me on the way home from school for the past few days.
whoa thats creepy! have u seen the driver? do u think its someone from school?
No, I haven't seen the driver. And I don't know if it's someone from school, but it's really unsettling. I'm getting a bit scared, to be honest.
aw girl dont worry we'll figure it out do u want me to come over and we can talk about it in person?
Not now, I'm okay. Just needed to talk to someone about it. Don't mention it to anyone, okay? Especially not my husband, he'd just get paranoid and worried.
my lips are sealed dont worry i got ur back
hey girl i need to talk to u about something i found out
What's up? I've been meaning to talk to you too. Something weird happened with Mr. Anderson yesterday.
whats going on with him?
Yesterday he made some really creepy comments about my clothes and asked me personal questions. And then I found something weird on his desk...
what did u find?!
A map of my route home from school. I think he's the one who's been following me!
oh my god thats so creepy! i did some digging and i found out hes not even supposed to be working at the school! some creepy past going on
What?! Why is he working here?!
i dont know but i think we should report him to the principal or something this is getting too weird
I'm scared, Angie. What if he does something to me? But at the same time, I don't want to ruin my reputation at the school...
girl dont worry about ur reputation u need to be safe i'm here for u and we'll figure this out together
